messages.title: ONLY BY VOTING FOR STEPHEN HOLLAND CAN WE ACHIEVE THE CHANGE WE NEED
messages.content: In just a few days you'll have the chance to vote in the most important general election for a generation. When you're standing in the polling booth with the pencil in your hand, think about what kind of country you want Britain to be. If you want a country that has an economy that works for everyone and where enterprise is rewarded, vote for change.

messages.title: 60 SECOND Q&A WITH STEPHEN HOLLAND
messages.content: As answers to various questions about local priorities, pensioners, families, expenses, and trust.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour are now the party of unemployment. Conservatives will get Britain working again by boosting skills and by creating new jobs based on lower taxes and free from the politics of the past.

David Cameron has made the NHS his top personal priority. Conservatives want to improve it for everyone. The Conservatives will increase spending on the NHS every year. We are the only party to have made this commitment.
Will restore discipline and respect by restoring the authority of the police - getting them out onto streets and away from the paperwork.
Creating new Generation Schools cared for by new Generation Teachers. Giving parents, charities and groups, including churches, their heads, with good behavioural records involvement with schools.

issues.economy: If you want a country that works for everyone, vote for change.
issues.education: Creating new Generation Schools cared for by new Generation Teachers.
issues.environment: PROTECTING STOCKPORT'S LOCAL ENVIRONMENT - Conservatives will campaign against constructing on playing fields, like Woodbank Park, Torkington Park, Cale Green Park, Vernon Park and Heaton Moor Park.
issues.health: David Cameron has made the NHS his top personal priority.

housing.content: Vote for protecting Stockport's green spaces.

leaflet.personalStatement: ONLY BY VOTING FOR STEPHEN HOLLAND CAN WE ACHIEVE THE CHANGE WE NEED

contactInformation.address: Stockport Conservatives, 15 Chester Road, Stockport, SK7 5NU

endorsements.endorsement: This is a crucial time in the history of our country and the choice at this election is clear: five more years of Gordon Brown or change with the Conservatives.

leaflet.additionalNotes: STEPHEN'S FACTFILE outlines several issues pertaining to the Stockport area, including increases in council tax, health statistics, the availability of post offices, Labour's debt impact on the constituency, and the campaign for better transport.
